questions.text: Who did Diane want for the wedding?
questions.explanation:
Vivaldi.

	Antonio Vivaldi (1678-1741) was a Baroque composer and violinist. Diane loved classical music but Sam did not like it. However, Sam didn't care who she had playing at the wedding because he wasn't planning to be there. Diane still believed Sam would eventually propose to her again.

questions.text: Did Sam say he loved Diane?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Diane claimed that Sam loved her when he proposed and couldn't change his feelings that quickly. Sam claimed he never said he loved her to which Diane asked why he would propose if it wasn't because of love.

questions.text: What did Diane compare Sam's brain to?
questions.explanation:
solid rock.

	Diane was always insulting Sam's intelligence. One could understand why Sam didn't want to propose again, with the way she treated him.

questions.text: What animal did Carla bring into the bar?
questions.explanation:
cat.

	The cat had kittens while she was at Cheers. Carla didn't realize that the cat was pregnant, she just wanted to get her kids a pet.

questions.text: Who did Sam have a date with at first?
questions.explanation:
Rhonda.

	Rhonda cancelled their date, saying she became born again. Sam asked her if she could become born again on Monday.

questions.text: Who did Sam make a date with after his first date cancelled?
questions.explanation:
Vicki.

	Vicki was played by Brenda Strong. Brenda Strong is probably best known for her role as Mary Alice Young on "Desperate Housewives".

questions.text: What did Sam and his date order for dinner?
questions.explanation:
scallops.

	Sam was determined to have a great weekend despite Diane telling him the weekend would be a disaster. However, he was so nervous he knocked over the water.

questions.text: Why did Sam's date have to leave?
questions.explanation:
grandmother was ill.

	Sam begged her not to leave but she said she had to go because she wasn't a doctor. Sam wouldn't drive her back and called her a cab.

questions.text: What show was Sam watching in the hotel room?
questions.explanation:
Wheel of Fortune.

	The lady on the show bought a vowel and Sam got upset because there was only two spaces left. He asked, "Where do they get these people?"

questions.text: How did Carla get rid of her animal's babies?
questions.correct: gave away a free beer with each one
options: gave them all to Woody since he was a farm boy
questions.explanation:
gave away a free beer with each one.

	Norm ended up taking all of the kittens because he loved his beer. Carla got rid of them very quickly because of this.
